menu.title: Fitness menu
menu.descr: Fitness menu' - is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. A product of active and healthy people. This is a completely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Lenten menu
menu.descr: Lenten menu - this is a careful selection of ingredients: a complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the correct amount of protein due to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Premium menu'
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - restaurant menu without going to the restaurant!
